summary: STARTED RECEIVING A CONSTANT, "SERVICE AIR BAG" WARNING MESSAGE AFTER 125,000 MILES.  THE DEALER TOLD ME THE PASSENGER PRESENCE MODULE NEEDED REPLACED.  IT WILL COST $1,000 FOR THE PART, LABOR, AND PROGRAMMING.  NOW I READ ON THIS FORUM THAT THE SAME ISSUE WAS FOUND ON THE CTS MODEL AND IT WAS RECALLED BY THE MANUFACTURER, BUT NOT THE STS.   IT'S DIFFICULT TO JUSTIFY PUTTING THAT MUCH MONEY IN AN OLDER VEHICLE.
